sentences.sContent: I picked up her wrist. It was limp and flaccid.
sentences.sCn: 我抓起她的手腕，她的手腕软弱无力。

synos.tran: [生理][植][医]弛缓的；软弱的；无活力的

phrases.pCn: 驰缓性麻痹；弛缓性瘫痪；松弛性麻痹；软瘫

trans.tranCn: 软弱的, 无活力的, 没气力的
trans.tranOther: You use flaccid to describe a part of someone's body when it is unpleasantly soft and not hard or firm
